verses.text: A onh anima onh tic tzonh alji d'a co nun, jab'nhej tiempo squila', scalnhej yaelal tzonh eq'ui.
Lajan co q'uinal tic icha junoc anh xumac vanto spojeli, elanhchamel stacjipaxi. Lajan pax icha tz'aj satxicanem junoc enhul.
Mamin, 多tas yuj tzak' val och a sat d'ayin to anima innhej? 多Tas yuj tza nib'ej tza ch'olb'itej junoc tas malaj yelk'ochi?
多Toc ay mach syal yik'anel tas vach' d'a scal tas manh vach'oc?
A ach tic tzala' jantac tiempo syil junjun anima. Chequel yaji jaye' sb'isul k'ual squila', max yal yek' jayeocxo k'ual uuj.
Iq'uel a sat d'ayin yic tzin can d'a junk'olal. Ak' tzalajb'oc in k'ol icha stzalajb'i sk'ol eb' munlajvum, ayic slajvi smunlaj eb'.
Ayic sch'acjiel junoc te te', scak'och yipoc co k'ool to ol ja svol te', axo te svol chi' sq'uib'xi.
Vach'chom te ichamxo te' sch'anhal yib' chi', vach'chom vanxo sk'ab'at te' yib',
axo yic tz'emk'och sical a a' d'a te', syaxb'ixi te', svolanxi te' icha junoc te' yuneto tz'avchaji.
A onhxo pax anima onh tic, ayic tzonh chami, manhxa tas syal cuuj. Ayic tz'el co pixan, manhxalaj mach tzonh ilani.
Icha tz'aj sq'ue vaan xob'al a' mar, ma icha tz'aj stup a a' sb'eyi,
icha chi' tz'aj co cham a onh anima onh tic. Yacb'an aytoek' satchaanh tic, malaj val junoc chamnac anima ol comon pitzvoc b'aj mucan, malaj junoc ol comon q'ue vaan d'a yed'tal chi'.
Comonoc tzin a k'ub'ejel d'a chamel chi', yacb'an tz'ek'b'at yoval a k'ool. Tza naanpaxi b'aq'uinh tzin a naxicoti.
A junoc anima schami, 多tom ol pitzvocxi? Palta a inxo tic ol vak' techaj in yaelal tic, masanto ol k'och sk'ual vel d'a libre.
Ol ach avaj d'ayin, ol in tak'voc d'ayach. Ol am ach tzalaj in ilanochi, yujto a ach a b'onac in.
A ticnaic, q'uelan ach och d'a in b'eyb'al. Axo d'a jun k'ual chi', manhxo ol ik' a cuenta d'a in mul.
Ol b'atcan in chucal chi' satk'olal uuj. Ol ak'an lajvoc in mul.
A lum nivac vitz ayic tz'elta lum k'acapil, satem luum, axo q'uen nivac q'ueen tz'el q'uen d'a yed'tal.
Anhejtona' icha tz'aj yulaxb'at q'uen q'ueen d'a yol sb'e a a', ma icha tz'aj yik'chajb'at lum luum yuj a', icha chi' tz'aj ak'an lajvoc tas ayoch yipoc co k'ool a onh anima onh tic.
A ach te ek'b'al achnhej d'a quichanh, tzonh ik'anxi meltzaj d'a junelnhej, tzak'an ixtax co sat yic tzonh chami.
Vach'chom a eb' calcuninal te b'inajnac ol aj eb', mato ay eb' manhxalaj ol aj yelk'ochi, palta manhxo cojtacoc, manhxalaj mach ol yal yalan cab'i.
Q'uinaloc chamnac onhxo, axonhej am cuuj scak' pensar, yujto scab'val syail, xchi vinhaj Job chi'.
